Package be.docarch.odt2braille

Class Summary
BrailleFileExporter Implementation of AbstractEmbosser for generating generic braille files: Braille Formatted (.brf) Braille Formatted (.brf) - slightly modified for correct interpretation by wprint55 MicroBraille file (.brl) Spanish Braille file (.bra)
CharacterStyle  
Checker With this class a document can be checked for possible accessibility issues.

LiblouisXML  
ListNumber A ListNumber instance keeps track of the numbering of an OpenOffice.org list (or the sequence of OpenOffice.org headings).
ListStyle  
ListStyleProperties The numbering properties of either an OpenOffice.org list or the sequence of OpenOffice.org headings.
NamespaceContext Implementation of NamespaceContext for bounding prefixes to namespace URI's.
OdtTransformer This class enables you to transform a flat .odt file to a DAISY-like xml file that is suited to be processed by liblouisxml.
OutputURIResolver  
ParagraphStyle  
PEF This class provides a way to convert a flat .odt file to a .pef (portable embosser format) file.
